freenet.node
Class PeerMessageQueue

java.lang.Object
  freenet.node.PeerMessageQueue

public class PeerMessageQueue
extends Object

Queue of messages to send to a node. Ordered first by priority then by time. Will soon be round-robin between different transfers/UIDs/clients too.

Author:
Matthew Toseland (0xE43DA450)

getNextUrgentTime

public long getNextUrgentTime(long t,
                              long now)
Get the time at which the next message must be sent. If any message is overdue, we will return a value less than now, which may not be completely accurate.

Parameters:
t -
now -
